test_message: Student requests defense session to upgrade verification level for submission #7842. Current status: Verified with Assistance. Student wants to demonstrate independent understanding.

pre_defense_brief.process_explanation: You will explain your code solution, answer questions about your approach, and discuss how you tackled any challenges.

defense_outcome.defense_notes: The student clearly explained their code and demonstrated an independent understanding of the logic.

next_steps.feedback_provided: You effectively communicated your understanding and problem-solving approach.

result.student_support: Great job! Keep practicing to maintain your independent skill level.
